text: The 1996 German Formula Three Championship () was the 22nd edition of the German Formula Three Championship. It commenced on 14 April 1996 and ended on 13 October. Italian driver Jarno Trulli won the title with six wins for the Swiss Opel Team KMS Benetton Formula. ==Teams and drivers== {| | {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" !colspan=7| 1996 Entry List |- !
